title: Pinterest Clone App
description: A full-stack Pinterest clone built with React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS. Users can create boards, upload images, and explore others' pins.
details: This clone app mimics core features of Pinterest such as creating pins, saving pins to boards, user authentication, and responsive masonry layouts. It includes secure backend APIs and image uploads using Cloudinary.

title: Country Information System
description: An interactive React-based application that displays country data fetched from a public REST API.
details: This project enables users to search for any country and view detailed information including population, flag, capital, languages, and more. It uses React Hooks, Context API, and responsive design.

title: Landing Page for Product Sales
description: A modern landing page developed using WordPress and custom JavaScript/CSS for product promotions.
details: This single-page website is optimized for SEO and built for product marketing campaigns. It includes call-to-action sections, contact forms, animations, and a mobile-first layout.
